caption.p: UVâ€“vis spectra of the [P 44414]Cl + CH 3COOH system (73.0 wt.% [P 44414]Cl and 27.0 wt.% CH 3COOH) after metal oxide dissolution at 323 K for 24 h (blue line) and the corresponding spectra of the metal chloride salt in aqueous solution (red line). The dashed line corresponds to the spectra of the [P 44414]Cl + CH 3COOH mixture in the absence of metals.
